p: In contrast, damaged endothelial cells have reduced almost all antithrombotic molecules and express many molecules that promote thrombus formation. Examples include tissue factor (TF), which triggers blood coagulation reaction; von Willebrand factor (VWF), which triggers platelet aggregation; plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 (PAI-1), which attenuates fibrinolysis; and tumor necrosis factor-α (TNF-α), which induces an inflammatory response ( Table 3) [ 34, 35, 36].
